Negative_Review: Bathroom looked tired and was in need of a re fresh Grout was dirty Towels were thin cheap Fridge in room did not work Skip the 14Euro Breakfast and head to one of the many local bakeries for your morning meal and coffee
Positive_Review: Good location with easy access to several Metro stations Nice neighborhood with good selection of restaurants and bakeries within easy walking distance Good value for money Room was clean and bed was comfortable Air Conditioning worked well Friendly staff

Negative_Review: Doesn t have a GYM and when I need to swim they have change a water and I don t know why they didn t change the water before they are opening and there is a small rooms
Positive_Review: It s close from a lot of thing as like shopping transportations etc

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Very helpful staff and good location in relation to city center Just far enough away to not have the noise and bustle of the center but close enough to walk to it Good wifi Nice breakfast buffet Great bathroom although bedroom a bit small if you are like me close to 2 meters but not a real issue

Negative_Review: My fianc and I are not big people I would say average and It was very small for the money But it is Paris and real estate is very expensive so it s understandable Just beware
Positive_Review: It was nice but very small

Negative_Review: our room was the escape for the floor the air conditioning never really cooled down the room the view was to other buildings around a center courtyard or something not a city view
Positive_Review: price was right

Negative_Review: Room view was depressing Right on other buildings A dog was barking each evening from a neighbor building Very small shower
Positive_Review: Friendly receptionist Clean hotel Supermarket close Little eateries as well

Negative_Review: The worst room I ve ever had in Paris Dirty Tiles in bathroom were falling off bugs in the tub water damage on the ceiling and outside our room Dirty walls Absolutely gross and overpriced The staff was rude and downright mean I would never stay here again and advise everyone to steer clear of this tourist trap I come to Paris multiple times a year there are so many wonderful hotels for the same price point where the staff is actually lovely and helpful AVOID AT ALL COSTS Do not eat the breakfast Just gross all around
Positive_Review: NOTHING

Negative_Review: Iron was useless spend an extra 10 Euro for a model with steam The hangers in the closet were broken The layout of the room especially the washroom was challenging A bit of creative thought into design of the room layout would improve things quite a bit
Positive_Review: Front desk staff were friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Downside of the topfloor was the high temperatures in the room as the sun burned the roof The airco could not keep up Must say the temperature was almost record high in Paris
Positive_Review: Comfortable beds French queen size so not the biggest We had a room on the top floor with a big terrasse

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This hotel was perfect for our quick trip to Paris Convenient to navigate from by either walking the Metro or hop on hop off bus tour We didn t use the restaurant as it is so convenient to many sidewalk eateries and pubs For the price this is a great deal

Negative_Review: It s not alt all the reality of the image shown st booking com Room are horrible dirty the location is very bad for vacation very far of Arc de Triomphe all shopping It s not the ideal hotel to book for holiday Wifi not good too
Positive_Review: Only staff Only staff

Negative_Review: You couldn t open the window to get any fresh air it was screwed shut The view onto the back of the building behind was ordinary but we weren t in the room during the day The lift was supposed to hold 4 adults 2 adults fitted fine with luggage it was a struggle 2 people in the lift with luggage and no one else could get in
Positive_Review: The location was good it was about a 20 minute walk to the Arc de Triomphe Lots of little places to eat around The breakfast was cheaper than eating out but still expensive for what it was

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location just 10 min walk from Arc de Triumphe Staff are very nicely especially young girl on reception Whatever we needed they were on disposal Hotel very clean

Negative_Review: The shower is somewhat cramped
Positive_Review: This is a fantastic location It is an easy walk to the Arc de Triomphe and Charles de Gaulle Metro RER station The neighborhood is very quiet and safe The hotel is very comfortable and the staff is very helpful The pool is a nice touch after a long hot day

Negative_Review: The space quite clostraphobic and lack of parking at affordable price
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful and the macaroons left on the bed were a nice suprise

Negative_Review: The breakfast was expensive 14 euros for each of us My husband had a croissant and tea and I only had coffee still 28 euros the sauna is very bad shape many boards loose probally should be closed until repaired The lift elevator was right next to our room I booked three months in advance I asked for a room not facing the street and got one facing the street next to the elevator There is a nice bakery and many other breakfast choices within one block so don t eat there They did give us but one bottle of water stayed there three night with weather in 90 when I asked for a bottle more money charged Never gave us additional soaps or shampoo s
Positive_Review: The front desk staff was nice and they spoke English which was kind as we know very little French

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very clean Very professional staff A 10 mn walk from the Arc de Triomphe and a 6 mn away from the direct bus to Monparnasse and the Direct bus to the CDG the conditioning is very good as well Thank you

Negative_Review: The rooms are very small and badly isolated from each other so you ca hear from all your neighboring rooms I had the luxury room and supposedly the largest and on the top floor Still I could hear the toilet flush from other rooms as if somebody flush the toilet next to my bed Breakfast was very average given its price
Positive_Review: The hotel is very centrally located

Negative_Review: Rooms not too sound proof Shower from next room quite noisy
Positive_Review: The property was in an excellent location Breakfast very good Walking distance to Arc de Triomphe easy access to other sights

Negative_Review: It takes about 15 minutes to Porte Malliot where the Air France express bus drops you off from CDG The nearby Metro stations Argentine and Perriere are also a 10 15 minute walk away Therefore budget for it
Positive_Review: Staff is very cooperative and speaks English which is very helpful in a city like Paris They are eager to help if you have questions about where to go look up Google maps etc WiFi in the hotel works well we got good high speed connections most of the time

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The pool was amazing The location is the cutest little spot nestled in Paris You wouldn t even know its there and its perfect The breakfast was amazing

Negative_Review: The cooling in the room was never fixed so it was a bit too warm sometimes
Positive_Review: Great pool friendly staff rooms were cleaned every day Food locations and metros were close by

Negative_Review: The hot chocolate in the buffet tastes cheap and should be made out of proper milk and chocolate Otherwise there is nothing negative the best hotel I have stayed at in Paris
Positive_Review: I loved the stay and the service and location would come back

Negative_Review: The view out of my room s window was the only negative point it was just narrow space surrounded by buildings all around
Positive_Review: hotel location is like 10 minutes walk from metro station and 15 minutes from Arc de Triomphe with nearby grocery pharmacy asian food restaurant boulangerie vegetables and flowers market Rooms are small but neat and clean and with a powerful shower

Negative_Review: The bathtub was abit small i m 6 3 so i guess all are and you could not open the glass window wich prevents water splashing out if you shower making it abit tricky getting in and out of Regarding the breakfast i think they could add a hot meal or two and it would be perfect There is not a big sign so you cannot spot it from a disctance yes it is a petty thing but there really wasnt any major issues with this hotel so
Positive_Review: Really nice and helpful staff everything was neat and clean The room itself was very nice with an extra door that you could close to shut the noise out from the corridor toilet if your partner had to go at night There was also this iron curtain outside your windows that you could close security felt safe though There are also some slippers and two robes if you are planning on going to the spa or sauna Never got the chance to tryout the spa facility but it looked really nice and inviting and they got a computer that you can borrow free of charge mac wich for me was abit tricky Lots of lighting comfy bed with four pillows and one cover big enough for two You get an umbrella to borrow if need be wich i needed at the time And if you got an early flight it is super easy and close to Porte Maillot takes perhaps 10 min normal walking pace The breakfast was nice but nothing over the top will get you going though The hotel is located on a sidestreet away from the worst noise and you got restaurants just around the corner The whole experience from when you walked inside until you left was very pleasant and i would not hesitate to go there again

Negative_Review: The Hotel was very old and not painted well The bathroom was smaller than the airplane
Positive_Review: One of the worst 4 stars Hotel I have ever visited I have arrived at 9 o clock and the reception they told to go for a walk till 13 30 which ist anacceptale the hotel has no real lobby

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location was very good The metro station is approx 450m away and the bus stop is only 100m away from the hotel We used the both Metro N 3 and Bus No 92 It was so convenient that we could buy the 10 pcs of tickets for EUR 14 50 Carnet for Metro Bus Train at Tabaco Shop around the corner 50m from hotel and Bus Stop is also approx 100m away We were upgraded to the 8th floor top floor and the view over the Paris city was great Considering that it s in Paris the room was not too small and it had a balcony Breakfast was also fine and coffee was very good The personal at the reception were very friendly and welcoming and we will of course stay here when we visit Paris again

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Our room Room 801 was very spacious for Paris standards and had a double length balcony that overlooked the roofs of Paris From one end of the balcony we had a view of the Eiffel Tower and from the other side a few of the Sacre Couer

Negative_Review: Receptionist not at the front area during night shifts Might be a precedence for thievery as anyone can go in and out without employees guard visible
Positive_Review: Cleanliness

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent hotel facilities were second to none and the hotel was near the arc de triomphe but was in a quiet neighbourhood The hotel was excellent value for money and the staff couldn t be anymore accommodating I would definitely return in the future

Negative_Review: Slightly further from the main hub than we thought but Metro nearby was easy to use when we chose not to walk
Positive_Review: Great room well equipped with fridge and kettle Spa was lovely after long days of sightseeing Staff very helpful Highly recommended

Negative_Review: Bathroom and toilet are small but spotlessly clean and modern
Positive_Review: A great location in the centre of Paris 5 mins walk to Metro and about 10mins walk to Arc de Triomphe Great shower and plenty of hot water Very friendly and helpful staff multi lingual Good wifi internet service Nice lounge on the ground floor with Apple Mac printer complimentary newspapers and magazines There is a small swimming pool in the basement

Negative_Review: We checked in to Westside on the 6th evening The lady who checked us in was professional and courteous The lady in the morning every day was also very professional and courteous But there was a gentleman we dealt with in the evening every time who was eternally grumpy and seemed to react like we were an interruption to what he was doing The Hotel rooms were very small for a 4 star hotel and not what we expected The breakfast was one table with bread and croissants and few other knick knacks You would definitely expect more from a 4 Star hotel On our second day we ordered room service and I ordered Lentil Soup Lebanese Platter and French Fries We waited for more than 90 minutes and after multiple follow ups I got Lentil Soup a plate of cheese and no French fries I did not have dinner that night Apparently this hotel does not have Room Service in house They just order from a nearby restaurant and so there is a lot lost in translation My Sister s family who were staying with us could not get water delivered either Overall it was a very disappointing stay especially after travelling through Italy Switzerland and getting some amazing service from similar sized and similar category hotels As mentioned the plus points were the location and the friendly lady receptionists who were professional and courteous The remaining staff were quite unfriendly and we felt quite unwelcome including the ladies at the breakfast who were very curt I provide this feedback as a constructive feedback so the hotel can view the service from the perspective of the recipient of such services and look at ways to enhance the same
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel was the only bright spot in our stay The lady manning the reception during the mornings was very professional and very friendly Also the second lady we met during our stay whose name eludes me was quite friendly too

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room was tiny and not clean It was more like a 2 stars hotel with a pool I did not use the pool They take a copy of credit card which is pretty stupid in the sense of security and not secure for the guest They give a login and password for the WiFi but WiFi does not require any password When I called them about it they suggest me to reset my computer They do not have a twin bed in the room but they brought two 1 person beds together and this was extremely uncomfortable

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and willing to help Especially the gentleman at the night shift Maddy Besides that the room was very clean and the location of the hotel was very near to the center Finally I can say that it was a very positive experience

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room was very basic but all the amenities were great Room was very clean shower was great bed was comfy TV was good and the staff were friendly and helpful throughout the trip We only used it as a base as we were out all day and night so it was great value for money Would recommend to others

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Didn t have breakfast or coffee so couldn t comment there Great location staff were very friendly and accommodating Very positive good paris experience

Negative_Review: The whole hotel had an awful smell when you walked in The mini lobby smells like vinegar The old carpets smell bad and our room smelled like puke mixed with baby wipe products The bed was supposed to be for 2 people But I think they measure them for midgets not normal average humans The washroom was so tight when you sit on the toilet you face a wall and your knees touch it The rooms are so tight to each other that you hear everything Including the 2 hour sex sessions of your neighbours We also woke up to a fire alarm And people who close their doors next to us wake us up since the walls were paper thin and super close to one another Definetly not a 4 star hotel But If you have no other choice in terms of money the area is safe because it s all rich families and old people
Positive_Review: The only thing that I liked from the hotel was the fact that they gave us a free water bottle in the room

Negative_Review: Perhaps a little more milk coffee and tea in room would be appreciated
Positive_Review: Rooftop room with balcony wonderful views of beautiful Paris very pleased with accommodation Thank you

Negative_Review: No negatives really bigger lift
Positive_Review: Excellent welcome Manny was a credit to the hotel beds were great and comfy rooms v clean Would recommend and use again

Negative_Review: If I was being really picky I would say the bathroom is incredibly small If you are tall using the toilet is a work of art
Positive_Review: The staff were fantastic always happy to help The location was very central close to the Arc de Triomphe and in a nice area The hotel was very clean and the bed really comfortable Enjoyed the breakfast it had a good selection of food both hot and cold And although the classic double room was quite small my friend and I each had one it had everything needed and was perfect for one person I would happily return to this hotel Very reasonably priced

Negative_Review: There was no hot water for the first 2 days having travelled for a long time a cold shower is completely unacceptable Our first room had a big crack in the wall and flaking paint above the shower which was cold and leaked I had to ask to move rooms to be fair the second room was much better In need of some TCL the stairs were in need of decoration there was plaster missing on the walls on every flight of stairs and the carpets were very worn Lift wasn t great had to lug 2 cases down 4 flights of stairs after waiting 20 minutes without stopping
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No hot water for our stay Came on a romantic holiday to a 4 stay hotel Really unimpressed I tally offered a croissant as compensation Eventually offered 20 off the bill
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: We were told the Metro was closer it was definitely more than 250 yrds The bed was uncomfortable as I woke with a sore back each morning which lasted the duration of the following day Staff were as friendly as could be but their English wasn t great and directions to places were hard to understand
Positive_Review: Location was good very near the Arc de Triomhe There is a beautiful Patisserie very close to the hotel up beside the chapel which we had breakfast in each morning eat here Metro was about an 8 10 minute quick walk and had access to many places

Negative_Review: Small pokey room with no view out of the window other than a dark area for the fire escape We could barely see the sunlight on a bright sunny day as we realised when e left the hotel Walls were damaged by water next to the air conditioning unit Very small room for the price
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: I was on the top floor and difficult to access with luggage as stairs stopped at 7
Positive_Review: Location great walking distance to arc de thromphe lots of places to eat drink and shop locally Hotel staff very helpful Rooms spacious for Paris and very clean with comfortable bed

Negative_Review: The room looks bigger on the website but it was fine very clean Quiet and nice neighberhood Staff very nice and helpfull short walk to the metro station I will definitelly come back here
Positive_Review: I didn t have any breakfast

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The front desk staff was very helpful and provided all the information we asked about the surroundings Thank you guys for making our stay a very pleasant one

Negative_Review: Room size is small but you can not help it with old buildings
Positive_Review: Staff were awesome and helpful location is in a nice district close to Arc de triomphe and other sites

Negative_Review: The d cor felt tired On the stair well the paint was peeling and what looked like a damp patch was apparent The covers on the chairs in our room smelt of smoke I would definitely not rate this a 4 hotel
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: The bathroom was small and the bed wasn t particularly comfortable
Positive_Review: Location was great and easy access to Metro buses and great places to eat and drink

Negative_Review: Room smaller than expected Isolation could be improved bad experience with noisy neighbours in next door room quite late in the night Room cleaning was not done one day of our stay
Positive_Review: Good location with plenty of good restaurants and nice shops nearby Nice staff

Negative_Review: Very uncomfortable rooms we were upgraded to a room on the 8th floor that was pathetic there was no lift to the eight floor we were expected to carry 4 suitcases up a flight of stairs requested another room and was given one on the second floor this was much better than the upgraded room but this was never cleaned properly no towels replaced and trays from room services never collected definitely not recommend if you travelling with children
Positive_Review: Location was good

Negative_Review: The rooms were clean at check in but the daily cleaning was very bad My coffee cup was left on the table for about 2 days and rubbish were not taken away
Positive_Review: Great location

Negative_Review: Pool is small as advertised but it comes as a bonus enjoyed a quick dip to relax before dinner
Positive_Review: Lovely room with spacious ensure bathroom and a nice balcony with chairs to sit watch the world go by on the street below Really enjoyed would highly recommend

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Everything very friendly personal helpful and i will recommended to my friends The neighborhood very pleasant and tranquil close to Arc de Triomphe and excellent restaurants

Negative_Review: First experience entering the room and the pipe of shower was leaking spraying water all over the bathroom When I called reception I got the answer that there is nothing to be done at this point cause is Saturday night Breakfast very limited and for sure not what I paid according to the advertisement
Positive_Review: Location was nice

Negative_Review: the room is a shoebox the moment our luggage was inside we could hardly access the bed the shower is half open as it is so tiny guess to give the impression of space so the whole bathroom is wet
Positive_Review: not much

Negative_Review: Not realy 4 stars The room need some improvements We can hear everithing from other rooms The bathroom dirty Not ok for that price
Positive_Review: Location very good near to arc de triumph Personal very helpful

Negative_Review: Really quite disappointed with the room compact was an understatement The toilet and bathroom extractor fans were not working There wasn t a mirror on the wall in the bedroom so that you could dry your hair apply your makeup whilst the bathroom was being used On reflection I should have asked to be shown an alternative room
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Fair price for a good hotel
Positive_Review: good location with lots of options for bars and restaurants Close to exhibition centre Budget accommodation and real value for money Would select it again

Negative_Review: The shower door opened in a weird way which made it difficult to get in out of it They fix that real quick so I wasn t a big problem
Positive_Review: Location of this property is amazing It s in a quite street within walkable distance to Arc de triomphe It s very convenient as there s a supermarket nearby and boulangeries and pharmacies all around Staff was very friendly and patient which made our stay all the more pleasant

Negative_Review: The pool is a bucket
Positive_Review: The bed was stunning conpared to other hotels as were the pillows location couldnt have been better when the cost is considered next to metro short walk to everything staff were exceptional would stay here again and again

Negative_Review: The cereals served at breakfast did not taste great
Positive_Review: Friendly staff There were little macarons in our bedroom waiting for us The small pastries served at breakfast were yummy The staff remembered to bring us almond milk at breakfast one of us is lactose intolerant The pool was also very nice

Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: Staff is EXCEPTIONAL especially at the front desk extremely friendly and helpful I would stay there again just to have that kind of service

Negative_Review: Phone ringer was the loudest I have ever heard That needs to be taken care of as soon as possible AC was little loud when it kicked in once every couple of minutes Also the distance to the metro station
Positive_Review: The front desk staff are among the very best I had the pleasure of dealing with Fell in love with the neighborhood as it is mostly residential and is not far from the action

Negative_Review: Hotel rooms are ready for a lick of paint
Positive_Review: The hotel was away from the noise and crowds but still close enough to walk to local attractions The staff couldn t do enough for you and we re alway happy to help

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location of this hotel is excellent bed was comfortable the room was clean and spacious Breakfast was nice Good choice of hot or cold breakfast items Would defiantly stay again

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff is very friendly and looking to help The hotel is right in front of a bicycle rental station Velib which we used for sightseeing We loved the macaroons that were in our room upon arrival The hotel was an amazing price for what we received We would love to visit again

Negative_Review: Nothing I could think of I had a great time and everything was perfect
Positive_Review: The hotel was perfect It had a sauna and a pool that you could go from 9 00 till 22 00 and relax The breakfast was excellent very well presented and with a excellent quality The staff was very friendly and smiley there was nothing we asked and wasn t done The room was spacey and very beautiful had everything we needed They even had macaroon and chocolates to welcome us The WiFi was very good had very good signal in the room and it was fast The location was very good also 10 mins walk from the Arc de Triomphe and 7 mins from the metro Loved it

Negative_Review: Furnishings in room could have been modernised and perhaps an ironing board and iron would have been handy but neither of these things were important
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly and helpful Room very clean and comfortable Fridge in room was useful

Negative_Review: Breakfast Over priced and pretty ghastly to be honest We asked for a refund after first morning as it was not fresh and there was no variety Clearly this is the norm for food to be delivered to the hotel in the morning and there not to be a kitchen on site but for 14eu I d be looking elsewhere However this was a minor detail given the plus points of this hotel
Positive_Review: Staff were amazing Friendly and accommodating Location was perfect for a central Parisian stay Quiet and well appointed hotel that we would visit again

Negative_Review: Rooms small but clean and serviceable
Positive_Review: Lovely breakfast Freshly squeezed orange juice fresh fruit eggs etc Sets you up for the day Staff very friendly

Negative_Review: Clear instructions that early check in is NOT possible would have helped us to plan our day better rather than leading us to believe that it is a possibility Night time staff at reception could have been better
Positive_Review: Day time reception staff were very helpful

Negative_Review: perhaps a restaurant would have made the stay perfect
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful and polite they couldn t do enough for you The pool and sauna were excellent Rooms were very clean and in room facilities ie tea and coffee were also excellent Very enjoyable stay and would certainly return to this hotel again

Negative_Review: Bathroom was small It was awkward to sit on the toilet
Positive_Review: Excellent location 5 minute walk to the arc de triumph Staff went the extra mile Would come back

Negative_Review: Price of breakfast expensive there is a market just down the street so we just made our own each morning
Positive_Review: Kids 11 16 loved the pool and the friendly helpful staff

Negative_Review: This boutique hotel is in an older building We like the character and decor All the facilities worked very well
Positive_Review: The staff make all the difference Friendly helpful and very courteous

Negative_Review: Expensiive There was no provision for making English tea Only one small uht milk to share between 2 people which was not enough
Positive_Review: Good location clean with polite helpful friendly staff We also had a rooftop terrace with views over the Parisien rooftops which was a bonus

Negative_Review: One small snag the ladder into the pool wasn t fixed in properly But this was barely an issue
Positive_Review: Great breakfast every morning offering eggs sausages bacon various breads cheeses hams pastries and fresh fruit Staff were extremely helpful towards suggesting places to eat and drink in the area All bedrooms come with a great TV package we were able to watch all the sport on French TV as well as several BBC channels It was nice to be able to come back in the early evening after a day in Paris and unwind in the heated pool and sauna Would recommend this hotel to anybody going to Paris

Negative_Review: The only thing I would say is that when we arrived there was complimentary tea and coffee also a bottle of water When we had finished the water we asked for it to be replaced along with some more milk they wanted to charge us 3 euros for a small bottle of water
Positive_Review: The breakfast was good value The helpfulness of the staff The place was very clean with complimentary tea n coffee Apart from my report on the water I feel that the hotel is in a good position and definitely would recommend to anyone

Negative_Review: Wanted a early check in but was not possible
Positive_Review: I like the friendly staff and them speaking English Staff always asked how I was doing and if you needed anything Nice breakfast Close to the metro Lots of restaurants in walking distance

Negative_Review: I only went to the Pool room once but there were towels all over the floors and chairs Maybe add a sign that tells guests where to put their towels when they are done swimming Or maybe a staff member can check the swim room every two hours
Positive_Review: The service was really excellent The staff was incredibly helpful and comforting considering that I was traveling alone and it was my first time in Paris I really loved the decor of the hotel and the location Room 801 has a really amazing balcony that allows you to watch the beauty of Paris at all hours of the day You can even see the tip of the Eiffel Tower

Negative_Review: The room was not extremely large but this is to be expected in Paris
Positive_Review: Friendly staff and we were upgraded to a better room because it was our first visit

Negative_Review: Was quite far from louvre etc but 10 min walk to arc de triomphe and champs elysees Small lift could just about fit 2 of us with flight bags
Positive_Review: Double superior room was amazing room 803 private balcony with beautiful views Staff were amazing catered to our every need Information they gave us was good Pool was fantastic had it all to ourselves

Negative_Review: Nothing really to not like Really good rate for the hotel and location Had to pay 3euro for a bottle is the only thing I didnt like but thats nothing in comparison to how well they place was
Positive_Review: Customer service was great from start to finish They helped us in any way they could We forgot travel plugs adapters so they supplied us they told us how to get around and alwayd had a friendly attitude Would stay here again

Negative_Review: The room is very small we wake up with some noise that other enter to take a shower we cannot enter our clothes into room The price is higher and not include breakfast and very far from metro station Only one elevator and has capacity for two person
Positive_Review: Maybe only the bed and bathroom

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful and the room very comfortable The position of the hotel was perfect for us just a short walk to the Arc de Triomphe A nice touch were the macaroons left in our room as a welcoming gift

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel was in a great location and the staff were friendly and helpful The night porter Mardi went over and beyond though He was great really helpful friendly and a genuinely nice guy

Negative_Review: Place was flooded in the middle of the night No water in the hotel No toilet no shower nothing Manager was very rude when confronted and did not have decency to reply to email Not worth staying there Better hotels and cheaper in the area
Positive_Review: Location was good

Negative_Review: Breakfast wasn t included I was under the impression it was The pool is really tiny you can t do laps it s really just a bug bathtub The metro station is quite a long walk away
Positive_Review: It smelled of smoke so they gave me an upgrade There s a lovely restaurant on the road called Mom Paris

Negative_Review: The pool was small and I don t know why I paid more for the pool access which was ridiculous The bar area was not really welcoming so never used it
Positive_Review: I liked the dressing gown and slippers The location was good and we were surrounded by restaurants and shops in only a few short steps

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The amiability and professionalism of the staff and the perfect and safe location for my needs during this business trip Most of my meetings were within walking distance

Negative_Review: Lift very small slow could really do with a little smoking area
Positive_Review: Breakfast a little limited but what was there was excellent friendliness helpfulness of staff great little pool to relax at

Negative_Review: Room was too hot and it was not possible to adjust the air conditioning
Positive_Review: Excellent Wifi connection Great location and relatively quiet Very friendly and service minded staff

Negative_Review: No hot water after the Marathon and then no water at all for almost 24 hrs We were in room 802 for the first 4 nights Elevator went up to the 7th floor max so we had to take the stairs from the 7th to the 8th floor The bed in room 802 was not good at all as we wike up with back pain daily When we changed to room 106 on the 5th and last night due to the elevator being out of order we slept like babies The bed was amazingly confortable We felt we were ripped off for the first 4 nights
Positive_Review: Mahdi the receptionist Very helpful and nice guy

Negative_Review: Unfortunately whilst staying at the hotel the hotel experienced a flood and as such we had to reallocate to another room which was of a lesser standard small and crampt This also meant the lift was out of order the next day The hotel could benefit from soundproofing as the walls were quite thin
Positive_Review: Fantastic friendly and helpful staff who exceeded in all expectations Lovely added bonus of a pool and sauna facility

Negative_Review: Our room 106 was at the back of the hotel with it s window above the back exit On Sunday morning there was a steady stream of people going in and out with the back door banging all the while Not a great way to wake up on Marathon morning
Positive_Review: Good Clean room with pleasant staff The location was great and the sauna and pool were a nice addition for our stay

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: They opened breakfast extra early so we could all eat ahead of the marathon They kept us supplied with bottled water throughout the pool after the race made the next day so much less painful really lovely people and great value will be back next year for sure

Negative_Review: I didn t like that they would forget to give me my coffee creamer and shampoo but this is nothing compared to all the great service
Positive_Review: The service was excellent the staff was very friendly helpful and welcoming I also really liked the location because everything was nearby for example pastry shops supermarkets coffee shops restaurants post offices etc it would take me 3 minutes maximum to reach these places walking

Negative_Review: The breakfast was meh and always the same everyday 14 for a breakfast like that I d rather go to the McDonald s
Positive_Review: Comfy bed and welcome macarons

Negative_Review: Bed could be singular and not two single beds connected together Shower gel bottle is difficult to open and close No tea coffee or water refills the next day
Positive_Review: Friendly and helpful staff extended pool closing time Very clean room Upgraded our room to a room with a balcony for free

Negative_Review: The breakfast selection could have been a bit better with more choices There was no hot water in our room for 2 nights but the staff kindly let us change rooms On the last morning there was repair work going quite early and it was noisy woke me up
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and helpful The room was a good size and beds were comfy

Negative_Review: Bar prices mini bar were a little steep Limited choice of English television channels
Positive_Review: Really impressed with cleanliness The location is ideal as close to a major linking metro station if you don t mind a short walk up a slight hill The staff were very polite and helpful Didn t have time for full use of facilities so unsure on their condition Bedroom was more than amenable Plenty of room and huge bathroom shower Breakfast was help yourself continental buffet which was very pleasant Free wifi was a nice bonus Lift is useful especially if you have luggage

Negative_Review: The only downside was no English tea provided in the room that s just personal preference and probably could ve been rectified if we had contacted reception and some of the fixtures and fittings seemed to be loose not in a dangerous or depressing way mind
Positive_Review: The welcome was perfect and the room just how we wanted it The swimming pool is on the small size but perfectly adequate for the size of the hotel Overall we loved the hotel and it s location We would strongly recommend it to couples families and professionals alike

Negative_Review: If it wasn t considered a 4 hotel I wouldn t write perhaps the following points rooms very tiny nothing to say about the bathroom decrepit facilities although the lobby seems quite fresh quite poor breakfast rooms not soundproof from neighboring ones not able to prepare the breakfast to go even if asked a day in advance So I would rather consider it a good 3 hotel but then pay attention at the price And I know it s Paris and that s the case with most of the hotels but that should not be an excuse for ranking it properly
Positive_Review: A quite area yet close to the Arc de Triomphe

Negative_Review: Lift for max 3 slim people breakfast starting at 7am can be a bit late and WiFi didn t work for me No view except back of next building
Positive_Review: Facilities and cleanliness Nice little pool and sauna

Negative_Review: The breakfast could of been a lot better Especially the hot section Only 3 items to choose from regarding a fryup
Positive_Review: Nice clean hotel with nice staff Close to a lot of attractions

Negative_Review: I requested via booking com to do an early check in since my flight arrives at 6am and I will do an early check out in return got positive response from hotel stating that it is fine but subject to availability of the room when I arrived they refused to let me check in saying that I should have booked an extra night I told them that I was informed via booking com that it will be ok to early check in but they only let me check in at 11am staying 3 hours in the lobby after a 7 hours flight After that they tried to play another game by saying that the breakfast is not included I insisted that I paid extra for the breakfast through booking com and they said no you will be charged if you take the breakfast I showed them the detailed invoice in my email and then they accepted to let me have the breakfast that was a very unprofessional dealing with their staff and definitely I will never visit their hotel neither recommend it to anyone And that was my first time to have such a bad experience in paris
Positive_Review: Value for money wasn t bad a very tiny hotel located few hundred meters behind the arch Breakfast was fair

Negative_Review: Lots of noise at night coming from the interior courtyard but nothing too bad
Positive_Review: Location location location this is what best describes this hotel Easy to access there is a direct bus line to the Tour Eiffel 5 stops and the Arque de Triomphe 2 stops with the Avenue of Champs d Elysee being at only a short walk from the hotel Rooms are of a decent size for Paris quite clean and we ve had a good breakfast There s also a pool which we didn t get to try but looked spectacular

Negative_Review: The general ambiance of the corridors is old The elevators were too small so it is better to use the spiral staircase going to your room Somehow it does not feel like a four star hotel
Positive_Review: The hotel was clean and within walking distance to a bus stop that will bring you to Arc de Triomphe 2 bus stops away It is quite close to FNAC Department Store and a few good restaurants We appreciated the macarons as welcome snacks The staff Thibault was really friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: bed could be a little bigger we did not choose the breakfast and what we saw did not convince us with regards to value for money
Positive_Review: location close to Charles de Gaulle Etoile clean rooms with lots of small courtesies extras e g macarons kettle bathrobe WIFI and TV selection great choice of info material maps city exhibitions and magazines in the room friendly and helpful staff

Negative_Review: They did not change our bedsheet throughout our 8 nites there How I knew was when I realised the little stain of milo was still on my bedsheet although they made up the bed and room daily Distance to Pierre metro station was also quite a distance
Positive_Review: We were happy with front desk as they accommodated to our needs Maddy was helpful but i find Fleur was particularly exceptionally helpful We were anxious and feared that the weight of our luggagesat have exceeded what was allowed Fleur tried to help us out by suggesting ways to reduce the weight Overall we were happy with reception Hotel was bright gave us a warm and welcoming feel Overall we are happy

Negative_Review: We had electricity issue in one of the mornings where we had no electricity at all Elevator is very small and inconvenient
Positive_Review: Location is pretty good Personnel was very friendly and helpful e g printed boarding passes We had a terrace with chairs and a table which we enjoyed very much

Negative_Review: we stayed at first floor and there was an unbearable bad smell when you opened the window
Positive_Review: Location of the hotel is very good so close to Arc de Triomphe Staff is extremely friendly nice welcoming with macarons and chocolate in the room

Negative_Review: Small room and bathroom dark Not enough hangers for towels difficult access to shower glass window letting cold air outdoor safety stairs in front of windows TV not in front of bed Difficult access to wardrobe
Positive_Review: Bright and clean lobby Staff helpful and professional

Negative_Review: All Paris Rooms are small or you pay through the nose for space Set expectations accordingly
Positive_Review: Excellent location for Beavais Airport travellers especially porte maillot bus station shuttle link 12 mins walk Best 4 Star Value in Paris too Great Staff

Negative_Review: Breakfast was charged at 17 which is excessive as only coffee and croissant required but no option on a cheaper light breakfast
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely nice friendly and helpful The room was adequate although not very big for a superior deluxe

Negative_Review: Nothing to complain about
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely helpful with all aspects of our weekend stay Couldn t fault it The hotel was extremely comfortable and was in a great location

Negative_Review: Only one elevator for the service and the guests
Positive_Review: Location of the hotel was really good Very close to Arc de Triomphe and Pereire RER station Friendly and helpful staff Clean and comfortable very good cost price relationship

Negative_Review: Housekeeping was done late in the evening Breakfast was exactly the same everyday
Positive_Review: Staff was extremely polite and helpful There were lots of TV channels for French speaking visitors

Negative_Review: Really small room bathroom lobby elevator Definetely not a four star hotel because of the above and the fact that the finishes of the interiors were in a bad state except for the bathroom
Positive_Review: Friendly and helpfull staff Quiet rooms

Negative_Review: The water wasn t hot but warm
Positive_Review: The location is just perfect the room was clean and comfortable good WiFi connection not that expensive for a 4 stars hotel

Negative_Review: Toilet was in a very small room Still very manageable
Positive_Review: Location We were able to walk to the Champs Elysees The Louvre and Eiffel Tower Staff was very helpful with a map and even lended us a converter to charge our phone as we left ours at home

Negative_Review: The room was small but typical in this price range for Paris The bed was comfortable and the room had a small under desk refrigerator The only view through a small window was the building next door If you want a view of the Eiffel Tower or Arc de Triomphe in Paris it will cost you
Positive_Review: Great location within walking distance of the Arc de Triomphe and Champs lys es The English speaking staff was friendly and very helpful in giving directions and suggestions The front desk is attended 24 7 Very good value for the price

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: A really great hotel in a really nice part of Paris perfect Loads of restaurants but would certainly recommend Le Rital opposite the hotel Wine bar Italian Ivano speaks perfect English

Negative_Review: 1 The hotel is very expensive compared to the room provided 2 Rooms are very small 3 The bathroom is the smallest bathroom I have ever seen in the world 4 17 euros for the breakfast is expensive as the breakfast was very poor
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: 1 We had two rooms Bathroom of one of the rooms was very small almost making it impossible to sit on the toilet seat 2 Nearest metro was 10 to 15 minutes walk 3 Swimming pool very small
Positive_Review: 1 Location was about 10 to 15 minutes walk from Arc de Triomphe 2 Staff was very welcoming and nice 3 Carreforr market 2 minutes walk away 4 Many restaurants nearby 5 Indoor swimming pool and jacuzi and suana 6 Electric kettle available in room

Negative_Review: there is no breakfast included the price for on the hotel menu is too pricy no bar lift is too small a bit boring nothing really going on in the hotel
Positive_Review: the staff are friendly and helpful the location is good close to metro and bus station quiet area clean beautiful rooms worth the price mini bar safe free spacious bathroom and wardrobes comfortable bed and soft nice linen

Negative_Review: The only criticism would be the size of the lift but a porter was available to bring up the luggage
Positive_Review: The staff at reception in the breakfast room and those carrying out general duties were all very friendly and helpful The hotel is well situated for access to the metro and the Champs Elysees There are a number of good restaurants in the vicinity of the hotel The room was very comfortable and contained a table and chairs It had a pleasant view of the apartments across the street

Negative_Review: hotel wall is so thin i can hear the next door easly
Positive_Review: close to everywhere near to champ elysee by walking 15minutes by bus 5 minutes charles de gaulle metro station is so good have rer lines and main lines also try the nice restourants near by good food and not touristic tables de ternes ricci there is a nice pastry shop for the breakfast as well there is a paul on the same street u amy use the bus 92 to go up to champ elysee and charles de gaulle etoil by the 1 week chdg

Negative_Review: Lighting in the room was not great Wall lights only had a yellowy glow I though perhaps the breakfast room could have a little shelving unit to put your empty plates on The tables are small the staff are in out replenishing food so we had to put our dishes on a freshly dressed empty table beside us
Positive_Review: Loved Everything about this Hotel Best one I ve booked in Paris will stay here again 10 mins walk from Arc De Triomph on a quiet street within a business district Very helpful staff especially night receptionist Madey who had great recommendations for nearby bars etc Pool is located in the basement with a lift from each floor directly there Was great as you could leave your room in the complimentary gown slippers shower there swim in peace It is small but is perfect for a quick dip in the morning or a refreshing cool off after a long day sight seeing shopping Sauna is also just perfect Plenty of large towels on hand here too Breakfast is a continental with added scrambled eggs sausages smokey bacon Fresh juice freshly brewed coffee I would definately recommend adding this to your stay I have terrible back problems this is the first hotel I have ever stayed in that I didn t have problems with the mattress or pillows In fact I looked on the mattress to see the brand as I would buy one for home Double room was a little small but had everything including a safe mini bar We found an amazing bistro just along from Ternes Metro station Bistro Les 4 Saisons We had dinner there one evening which was lovely went back the following evening for a Rib of Beef for 55 for the 2 of us Amazing Would definately recommend trying there Lovely friendly staff

Negative_Review: The room was too hot at night and the lift is slow and small
Positive_Review: Quiet and convenient area with lots of stores and supermarket It provides easy access to most places in the city like Champs Elys es

Negative_Review: A bit far from a metro
Positive_Review: We got an upgraded room very nice It has a swimming pool sauna It s situated on a quite street 10 min walk to a metro air France shuttle to airport It s very nice about 5 min walk to a local market

Negative_Review: The elevator broke on the night we arrived so had to walk up 6 floors Not the hotel s fault they tried to fix it but Swimming pool is tiny
Positive_Review: Very nice hotel close to the Arc de Triomphe and two metro stops Around the corner is a classy street with really nice shops Very comfortable and elegant room as described Great price given all Highly recommend it

Negative_Review: There were bugs in our room because there was a hole in the wall and it started to rain
Positive_Review: Maddy staff member was amazing He was very kind and helped us with a bug problem we had in the room He also arranged free breakfast for compensation

Negative_Review: It was quite a long walk to a few of the attractions but it gives you a chance to find different restaurants and bakeries along the way
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and eager to help with any questions we had We stayed in a room with a balcony which was great to sit out and have a wine in the sun after a day of sightseeing

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent hotel Staff was extremely friendly room very nice clean and well equpped Location is also pretty close to perfect I don t think you can do better concerning price quality ratio No tourist trap feeling whatsoever You won t regret booking a room in this hotel

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Booked 2 nights stay for my son and his girlfriend Staff were very accommodating and looked after him through out his stay They even provided a free upgrade to a deluxe room as it was his birthday I would highly recommend thud hotel as the rooms are slightly larger than the average for Paris The addition of a pool and is very welcoming after a long day exploring the city The quality of the breakfast is first class and staff very attentive Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone considering a visit to Paris
